summary: Email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding travel arrangements for a fact witness in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial, indicating the witness could testify between December 1-3, 2021.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, requesting travel arrangements for a fact witness in the Maxwell trial.

events.title: Potential witness testimony start
events.description: The fact witness could begin testifying in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

events.title: Potential witness testimony end
events.description: The fact witness could finish testifying in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is a travel request for a fact witness in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
The witness was scheduled to testify between December 1 and December 3, 2021.
The correspondence originated from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email indicates flexibility in travel plans depending on when the witness finishes testifying.
